data.name: Sanctuary Assault Armor
data.detailed_description:
The Sanctuary Assault Armor is available when you pre-purchase the Sanctuary Assault Edition.

PACK CONTENTS:

  • Sanctuary Assault Armor

This exclusive armor is only available during pre-order.

Suit up with the Sanctuary Assault Armor and drop into action in...

PlanetSide Arena.

Plunge into PlanetSide Arena and battle online in this massive multiplayer sci-fi arena shooter. Choose your class, fuel your jetpack, and drop into the fray on the war-torn landscape of Auraxis starting summer 2019.

All editions of PlanetSide Arena come with Battle Pass Season 1, which includes additional weapon types, armor sets, and blueprints to customize your playstyle. Season 1 blasts off with two major game modes:

  • Massive Clash (250 vs. 250 group battle)
  • Battle Royale (Solos and Teams of 3)

If you want to come out on top, you'll have to go all in to rule the Arena.

data.short_description: The Sanctuary Assault Armor is available when you pre-purchase the Sanctuary Assault Edition. Suit up with the Sanctuary Assault Armor and drop into action in PlanetSide Arena.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64 bit only)
  • Processor: Intel i5-2500K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 570 series or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sounds Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64 bit only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sounds Card
